description: These are functions and (external) globals defined by various Halo engines.

engines.description: Halo: Combat Evolved on Xbox (English USA version) as released by Bungie
Halo: Combat Evolved on PC as released by Gearbox
Halo: Combat Evolved demo on PC as released by Gearbox
Halo Custom Edition on PC as released by Gearbox
Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary on MCC (PC version) as released by 343 Industries

functions.name: begin
functions.description: returns the last expression in a sequence after evaluating the sequence in order.

functions.name: begin_random
functions.description: evaluates the sequence of expressions in random order and returns the last value evaluated.

functions.name: cond
functions.description: returns the value associated with the first true condition.

functions.name: if
functions.description: returns one of two values based on the value of a condition.

functions.name: set
functions.description: set the value of a global variable.

functions.name: and
functions.description: returns true if all specified expressions are true.

functions.name: or
functions.description: returns true if any specified expressions are true.
returns the sum of all specified expressions.
returns the difference of two expressions.
returns the product of all specified expressions.
returns the quotient of two expressions.

functions.name: min
functions.description: returns the minimum of all specified expressions.

functions.name: max
functions.description: returns the maximum of all specified expressions.
returns true if two expressions are equal
returns true if two expressions are not equal
returns true if the first number is larger than the second.
returns true if the first number is smaller than the second.
returns true if the first number is larger than or equal to the second.
returns true if the first number is smaller than or equal to the second.

functions.name: sleep
functions.description: pauses execution of this script (or, optionally, another script) for the specified number of ticks.

functions.name: sleep_until
functions.description: pauses execution of this script until the specified condition is true, checking once per second unless a different number of ticks is specified.

functions.name: wake
functions.description: wakes a sleeping script in the next update.

functions.name: inspect
functions.description: prints the value of an expression to the screen for debugging purposes.

functions.name: unit
functions.description: converts an object to a unit.

functions.name: ai_debug_communication_suppress
functions.description: suppresses (or stops suppressing) a set of AI communication types.

functions.name: ai_debug_communication_ignore
functions.description: ignores (or stops ignoring) a set of AI communication types when printing out communications.

functions.name: ai_debug_communication_focus
functions.description: focuses (or stops focusing) a set of unit vocalization types.

functions.name: not
functions.description: returns the opposite of the expression.

functions.name: pin
functions.description: returns the first value pinned between the second two

functions.name: abs_integer
functions.description: return the absolute (non-negative) value of an integer

functions.name: abs_real
functions.description: return the absolute (non-negative) value of a real

functions.name: bitwise_and
functions.description: <lhs> AND <rhs>

functions.name: bitwise_or
functions.description: <lhs> OR <rhs>

functions.name: bitwise_xor
functions.description: <lhs> XOR <rhs>

functions.name: bitwise_left_shift
functions.description: <value> LHS <bit_count>

functions.name: bitwise_right_shift
functions.description: <value> RHS <bit_count>

functions.name: bit_test
functions.description: <flags> <bit_index>

functions.name: bit_toggle
functions.description: <flags> <bit_index> <on_or_off>

functions.name: bitwise_flags_toggle
functions.description: <value> <flags> <on_or_off>

functions.name: print
functions.description: prints a string to the console.

functions.name: print_if
functions.description: prints a string to the console if the condition is true.

functions.name: log_print
functions.description: prints a string to the hs log file.

functions.name: local_players
functions.description: returns a list of the living player units on the local machine

functions.name: players
functions.description: returns a list of the players

functions.name: players_on_multiplayer_team
functions.description: returns a list of the living player units on the MP team

functions.name: volume_teleport_players_not_inside
functions.description: moves all players outside a specified trigger volume to a specified flag.

functions.name: volume_test_object
functions.description: returns true if the specified object is within the specified volume.

functions.name: volume_test_objects
functions.description: returns true if any of the specified objects are within the specified volume.

functions.name: volume_test_objects_all
functions.description: returns true if any of the specified objects are within the specified volume.

functions.name: object_teleport
functions.description: moves the specified object to the specified flag.

functions.name: object_set_facing
functions.description: turns the specified object in the direction of the specified flag.

functions.name: object_set_shield
functions.description: sets the shield vitality of the specified object (between 0 and 1).

functions.name: object_set_permutation
functions.description: sets the desired region (use "" for all regions) to the permutation with the given name, e.g. (object_set_permutation flood "right arm" ~damaged)

functions.name: object_create
functions.description: creates an object from the scenario.

functions.name: object_destroy
functions.description: destroys an object.

functions.name: object_create_anew
functions.description: creates an object, destroying it first if it already exists.

functions.name: object_create_containing
functions.description: creates all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

functions.name: object_create_anew_containing
functions.description: creates anew all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

functions.name: object_destroy_containing
functions.description: destroys all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

functions.name: object_destroy_all
functions.description: destroys all non player objects.

functions.name: objects_delete_by_definition
functions.description: deletes all objects of type <definition>

functions.name: list_get
functions.description: returns an item in an object list.

functions.name: list_count
functions.description: returns the number of objects in a list

functions.name: list_count_not_dead
functions.description: returns the number of objects in a list that aren't dead

functions.name: effect_new
functions.description: starts the specified effect at the specified flag.

functions.name: effect_new_on_object_marker
functions.description: starts the specified effect on the specified object at the specified marker.

functions.name: damage_new
functions.description: causes the specified damage at the specified flag.

functions.name: damage_object
functions.description: causes the specified damage at the specified object.

functions.name: objects_can_see_object
functions.description: returns true if any of the specified units are looking within the specified number of degrees of the object.

functions.name: objects_can_see_flag
functions.description: returns true if any of the specified units are looking within the specified number of degrees of the flag.

functions.name: objects_distance_to_object
functions.description: returns minimum distance from any of the specified objects to the specified destination object. (returns -1 if there are no objects to check)

functions.name: objects_distance_to_flag
functions.description: returns minimum distance from any of the specified objects to the specified flag. (returns -1 if there are no objects, or no flag, to check)

functions.name: sound_set_gain
functions.description: absolutely do not use this

functions.name: sound_get_gain
functions.description: absolutely do not use this either

functions.name: script_recompile
functions.description: recompiles scripts.

functions.name: script_doc
functions.description: saves a file called hs_doc.txt with parameters for all script commands.

functions.name: help
functions.description: prints a description of the named function.

functions.name: random_range
functions.description: returns a random value in the range [lower bound, upper bound)

functions.name: real_random_range
functions.description: returns a random value in the range [lower bound, upper bound)

functions.name: physics_constants_reset
functions.description: resets all physics constants to earthly values

functions.name: physics_set_gravity
functions.description: set global gravity acceleration relative to halo standard gravity

functions.name: physics_get_gravity
functions.description: get the current global gravity acceleration relative to halo standard gravity

functions.name: numeric_countdown_timer_set
functions.description: <milliseconds>, <auto_start>

functions.name: numeric_countdown_timer_get
functions.description: <digit_index>

functions.name: breakable_surfaces_enable
functions.description: enables or disables breakability of all breakable surfaces on level

functions.name: recording_play
functions.description: make the specified unit run the specified cutscene recording.

functions.name: recording_play_and_delete
functions.description: make the specified unit run the specified cutscene recording, deletes the unit when the animation finishes.

functions.name: recording_play_and_hover
functions.description: make the specified vehicle run the specified cutscene recording, hovers the vehicle when the animation finishes.

functions.name: recording_kill
functions.description: kill the specified unit's cutscene recording.

functions.name: recording_time
functions.description: return the time remaining in the specified unit's cutscene recording.

functions.name: object_set_ranged_attack_inhibited
functions.description: FALSE prevents object from using ranged attack

functions.name: object_set_melee_attack_inhibited
functions.description: FALSE prevents object from using melee attack

functions.name: objects_dump_memory
functions.description: debugs object memory usage

functions.name: object_set_collideable
functions.description: FALSE prevents any object from colliding with the given object

functions.name: object_set_scale
functions.description: sets the scale for a given object and interpolates over the given number of frames to achieve that scale

functions.name: objects_attach
functions.description: attaches the second object to the first; both strings can be empty

functions.name: objects_detach
functions.description: detaches from the given parent object the given child object

functions.name: garbage_collect_now
functions.description: causes all garbage objects except those visible to a player to be collected immediately

functions.name: object_cannot_take_damage
functions.description: prevents an object from taking damage

functions.name: object_can_take_damage
functions.description: allows an object to take damage again

functions.name: object_beautify
functions.description: makes an object pretty for the remainder of the levels' cutscenes.

functions.name: objects_predict
functions.description: loads textures necessary to draw a objects that are about to come on-screen.

functions.name: object_type_predict
functions.description: loads textures necessary to draw an object that's about to come on-screen.

functions.name: object_pvs_activate
functions.description: just another (old) name for object_pvs_set_object.

functions.name: object_pvs_set_object
functions.description: sets the specified object as the special place that activates everything it sees.

functions.name: object_pvs_set_camera
functions.description: sets the specified cutscene camera point as the special place that activates everything it sees.

functions.name: object_pvs_clear
functions.description: removes the special place that activates everything it sees.

functions.name: render_lights
functions.description: enables/disables dynamic lights

functions.name: scenery_get_animation_time
functions.description: returns the number of ticks remaining in a custom animation (or zero, if the animation is over).

functions.name: scenery_animation_start
functions.description: starts a custom animation playing on a piece of scenery

functions.name: scenery_animation_start_at_frame
functions.description: starts a custom animation playing on a piece of scenery at a specific frame

functions.name: unit_can_blink
functions.description: allows a unit to blink or not (units never blink when they are dead)

functions.name: unit_open
functions.description: opens the hatches on the given unit

functions.name: unit_close
functions.description: closes the hatches on a given unit

functions.name: unit_kill
functions.description: kills a given unit, no saving throw

functions.name: unit_kill_silent
functions.description: kills a given unit silently (doesn't make them play their normal death animation or sound)

functions.name: unit_get_custom_animation_time
functions.description: returns the number of ticks remaining in a unit's custom animation (or zero, if the animation is over).

functions.name: unit_stop_custom_animation
functions.description: stops the custom animation running on the given unit.

functions.name: unit_custom_animation_at_frame
functions.description: starts a custom animation playing on a unit at a specific frame index(interpolates into animation if next to last parameter is TRUE)

functions.name: custom_animation
functions.description: starts a custom animation playing on a unit (interpolates into animation if last parameter is TRUE)

functions.name: custom_animation_list
functions.description: starts a custom animation playing on a unit list (interpolates into animation if last parameter is TRUE)

functions.name: unit_is_playing_custom_animation
functions.description: returns TRUE if the given unit is still playing a custom animation

functions.name: unit_aim_without_turning
functions.description: allows a unit to aim in place without turning

functions.name: unit_set_emotion
functions.description: sets a unit's facial expression (-1 is none, other values depend on unit)

functions.name: unit_set_enterable_by_player
functions.description: can be used to prevent the player from entering a vehicle

functions.name: unit_enter_vehicle
functions.description: puts the specified unit in the specified vehicle (in the named seat)

functions.name: vehicle_test_seat_list
functions.description: tests whether the named seat has an object in the object list

functions.name: vehicle_test_seat
functions.description: tests whether the named seat has a specified unit in it

functions.name: unit_set_emotion_animation
functions.description: sets the emotion animation to be used for the given unit

functions.name: unit_exit_vehicle
functions.description: makes a unit exit its vehicle

functions.name: unit_set_maximum_vitality
functions.description: sets a unit's maximum body and shield vitality

functions.name: units_set_maximum_vitality
functions.description: sets a group of units' maximum body and shield vitality

functions.name: unit_set_current_vitality
functions.description: sets a unit's current body and shield vitality

functions.name: units_set_current_vitality
functions.description: sets a group of units' current body and shield vitality

functions.name: vehicle_load_magic
functions.description: makes a list of units (named or by encounter) magically get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. CD-passenger... empty string matches all seats)

functions.name: vehicle_unload
functions.description: makes units get out of a vehicle from the substring-specified seats (e.g. CD-passenger... empty string matches all seats)

functions.name: magic_seat_name
functions.description: all units controlled by the player will assume the given seat name (valid values are 'asleep', 'alert', 'stand', 'crouch' and 'flee')

functions.name: unit_set_seat
functions.description: this unit will assume the named seat

functions.name: magic_melee_attack
functions.description: causes player's unit to start a melee attack

functions.name: vehicle_riders
functions.description: returns a list of all riders in a vehicle

functions.name: vehicle_driver
functions.description: returns the driver of a vehicle

functions.name: vehicle_gunner
functions.description: returns the gunner of a vehicle

functions.name: unit_get_health
functions.description: returns the health [0,1] of the unit, returns -1 if the unit does not exists

functions.name: unit_get_shield
functions.description: returns the shield [0,1] of the unit, returns -1 if the unit does not exists

functions.name: unit_get_total_grenade_count
functions.description: returns the total number of grenades for the given unit, 0 if it does not exist

functions.name: unit_has_weapon
functions.description: returns TRUE if the <unit> has <object> as a weapon, FALSE otherwise

functions.name: unit_has_weapon_readied
functions.description: returns TRUE if the <unit> has <object> as the primary weapon, FALSE otherwise

functions.name: unit_doesnt_drop_items
functions.description: prevents any of the given units from dropping weapons or grenades when they die

functions.name: unit_impervious
functions.description: prevents any of the given units from being knocked around or playing ping animations

functions.name: unit_suspended
functions.description: stops gravity from working on the given unit

functions.name: unit_solo_player_integrated_night_vision_is_active
functions.description: returns whether the night-vision mode could be activated via the flashlight button

functions.name: units_set_desired_flashlight_state
functions.description: sets the units' desired flashlight state

functions.name: unit_set_desired_flashlight_state
functions.description: sets the unit's desired flashlight state

functions.name: unit_get_current_flashlight_state
functions.description: gets the unit's current flashlight state

functions.name: device_set_never_appears_locked
functions.description: changes a machine's never_appears_locked flag, but only if paul is a bastard!

functions.name: device_get_power
functions.description: gets the current power of a named device

functions.name: device_set_power
functions.description: immediately sets the power of a named device to the given value

functions.name: device_set_position
functions.description: set the desired position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups)

functions.name: device_get_position
functions.description: gets the current position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups)

functions.name: device_set_position_immediate
functions.description: instantaneously changes the position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups

functions.name: device_group_get
functions.description: returns the desired value of the specified device group.

functions.name: device_group_set
functions.description: changes the desired value of the specified device group.

functions.name: device_group_set_immediate
functions.description: instantaneously changes the value of the specified device group.

functions.name: device_one_sided_set
functions.description: TRUE makes the given device one-sided (only able to be opened from one direction), FALSE makes it two-sided

functions.name: device_operates_automatically_set
functions.description: TRUE makes the given device open automatically when any biped is nearby, FALSE makes it not

functions.name: device_group_change_only_once_more_set
functions.description: TRUE allows a device to change states only once

functions.name: breakable_surfaces_reset
functions.description: restores all breakable surfaces

functions.name: cheat_all_powerups
functions.description: drops all powerups near player

functions.name: cheat_all_weapons
functions.description: drops all weapons near player

functions.name: cheat_spawn_warthog
functions.description: drops a warthog near player

functions.name: cheat_all_vehicles
functions.description: drops all vehicles on player

functions.name: cheat_teleport_to_camera
functions.description: teleports player to camera location

functions.name: cheat_active_camouflage
functions.description: gives the player active camouflage

functions.name: cheat_active_camouflage_local_player
functions.description: gives the player active camouflage

functions.name: cheats_load
functions.description: reloads the cheats.txt file

functions.name: ai_free
functions.description: removes a group of actors from their encounter and sets them free

functions.name: ai_free_units
functions.description: removes a set of units from their encounter (if any) and sets them free

functions.name: ai_attach
functions.description: attaches the specified unit to the specified encounter.

functions.name: ai_attach_free
functions.description: attaches a unit to a newly created free actor of the specified type

functions.name: ai_detach
functions.description: detaches the specified unit from all AI.

functions.name: ai_place
functions.description: places the specified encounter on the map.

functions.name: ai_kill
functions.description: instantly kills the specified encounter and/or squad.

functions.name: ai_kill_silent
functions.description: instantly and silently (no animation or sound played) kills the specified encounter and/or squad.

functions.name: ai_erase
functions.description: erases the specified encounter and/or squad.

functions.name: ai_erase_all
functions.description: erases all AI.

functions.name: ai_select
functions.description: selects the specified encounter.

functions.name: ai_deselect
functions.description: clears the selected encounter.

functions.name: ai_spawn_actor
functions.description: spawns a single actor in the specified encounter and/or squad.

functions.name: ai_set_respawn
functions.description: enables or disables respawning in the specified encounter.

functions.name: ai_set_deaf
functions.description: enables or disables hearing for actors in the specified encounter.

functions.name: ai_set_blind
functions.description: enables or disables sight for actors in the specified encounter.

functions.name: ai_magically_see_encounter
functions.description: makes one encounter magically aware of another.

functions.name: ai_magically_see_players
functions.description: makes an encounter magically aware of nearby players.

functions.name: ai_magically_see_unit
functions.description: makes an encounter magically aware of the specified unit.

functions.name: ai_timer_start
functions.description: makes a squad's delay timer start counting.

functions.name: ai_timer_expire
functions.description: makes a squad's delay timer expire and releases them to enter combat.

functions.name: ai_attack
functions.description: makes the specified platoon(s) go into the attacking state.

functions.name: ai_defend
functions.description: makes the specified platoon(s) go into the defending state.

functions.name: ai_retreat
functions.description: makes all squads in the specified platoon(s) maneuver to their designated maneuver squads.

functions.name: ai_maneuver
functions.description: makes all squads in the specified platoon(s) maneuver to their designated maneuver squads.

functions.name: ai_maneuver_enable
functions.description: enables or disables the maneuver/retreat rule for an encounter or platoon. the rule will still trigger, but none of the actors will be given the order to change squads.

functions.name: ai_migrate
functions.description: makes all or part of an encounter move to another encounter.

functions.name: ai_migrate_and_speak
functions.description: makes all or part of an encounter move to another encounter, and say their 'advance' or 'retreat' speech lines.

functions.name: ai_migrate_by_unit
functions.description: makes a named vehicle or group of units move to another encounter.

functions.name: ai_allegiance
functions.description: creates an allegiance between two teams.

functions.name: ai_allegiance_remove
functions.description: destroys an allegiance between two teams.

functions.name: ai_living_count
functions.description: return the number of living actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

functions.name: ai_living_fraction
functions.description: return the fraction [0-1] of living actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

functions.name: ai_strength
functions.description: return the current strength (average body vitality from 0-1) of the specified encounter and/or squad.

functions.name: ai_swarm_count
functions.description: return the number of swarm actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

functions.name: ai_nonswarm_count
functions.description: return the number of non-swarm actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

functions.name: ai_actors
functions.description: converts an ai reference to an object list.

functions.name: ai_go_to_vehicle
functions.description: tells a group of actors to get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. passenger for pelican)... does not interrupt any actors who are already going to vehicles

functions.name: ai_go_to_vehicle_override
functions.description: tells a group of actors to get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. passenger for pelican)... NB: any actors who are already going to vehicles will stop and go to this one instead!

functions.name: ai_going_to_vehicle
functions.description: return the number of actors that are still trying to get into the specified vehicle

functions.name: ai_exit_vehicle
functions.description: tells a group of actors to get out of any vehicles that they are in

functions.name: ai_braindead
functions.description: makes a group of actors braindead, or restores them to life (in their initial state)

functions.name: ai_braindead_by_unit
functions.description: makes a list of objects braindead, or restores them to life. if you pass in a vehicle index, it makes all actors in that vehicle braindead (including any built-in guns)

functions.name: ai_disregard
functions.description: if TRUE, forces all actors to completely disregard the specified units, otherwise lets them acknowledge the units again

functions.name: ai_prefer_target
functions.description: if TRUE, *ALL* enemies will prefer to attack the specified units. if FALSE, removes the preference.

functions.name: ai_teleport_to_starting_location
functions.description: teleports a group of actors to the starting locations of their current squad(s)

functions.name: ai_teleport_to_starting_location_if_unsupported
functions.description: teleports a group of actors to the starting locations of their current squad(s), only if they are not supported by solid ground (i.e. if they are falling after switching BSPs)

functions.name: ai_renew
functions.description: refreshes the health and grenade count of a group of actors, so they are as good as new

functions.name: ai_try_to_fight_nothing
functions.description: removes the preferential target setting from a group of actors

functions.name: ai_try_to_fight
functions.description: causes a group of actors to preferentially target another group of actors

functions.name: ai_try_to_fight_player
functions.description: causes a group of actors to preferentially target the player

functions.name: ai_command_list
functions.description: tells a group of actors to begin executing the specified command list

functions.name: ai_command_list_by_unit
functions.description: tells a named unit to begin executing the specified command list

functions.name: ai_command_list_advance
functions.description: tells a group of actors that are running a command list that they may advance further along the list (if they are waiting for a stimulus)

functions.name: ai_command_list_advance_by_unit
functions.description: just like ai_command_list_advance but operates upon a unit instead

functions.name: ai_command_list_status
functions.description: gets the status of a number of units running command lists: 0 = none, 1 = finished command list, 2 = waiting for stimulus, 3 = running command list

functions.name: ai_is_attacking
functions.description: returns whether a platoon is in the attacking mode (or if an encounter is specified, returns whether any platoon in that encounter is attacking)

functions.name: ai_force_active
functions.description: forces an encounter to remain active (i.e. not freeze in place) even if there are no players nearby

functions.name: ai_force_active_by_unit
functions.description: forces a named actor that is NOT in an encounter to remain active (i.e. not freeze in place) even if there are no players nearby

functions.name: ai_set_return_state
functions.description: sets the state that a group of actors will return to when they have nothing to do

functions.name: ai_set_current_state
functions.description: sets the current state of a group of actors. WARNING: may have unpredictable results on actors that are in combat

functions.name: ai_playfight
functions.description: sets an encounter to be playfighting or not

functions.name: ai_status
functions.description: returns the most severe combat status of a group of actors (0=inactive, 1=noncombat, 2=guarding, 3=search/suspicious, 4=definite enemy(heard or magic awareness), 5=visible enemy, 6=engaging in combat.

functions.name: ai_reconnect
functions.description: reconnects all AI information to the current structure bsp (use this after you create encounters or command lists in sapien, or place new firing points or command list points)

functions.name: ai_vehicle_encounter
functions.description: sets a vehicle to 'belong' to a particular encounter/squad. any actors who get into the vehicle will be placed in this squad. NB: vehicles potentially drivable by multiple teams need their own encounter!

functions.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_distance
functions.description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors within a certain distance

functions.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_team
functions.description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors on a certain team

functions.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_actor_type
functions.description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors of a certain type (grunt, elite, marine etc)

functions.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_actors
functions.description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for a certain encounter/squad of actors

functions.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_disable
functions.description: disables actors from impulsively getting into a vehicle (this is the default state for newly placed vehicles)

functions.name: ai_look_at_object
functions.description: tells an actor to look at an object until further notice

functions.name: ai_stop_looking
functions.description: tells an actor to stop looking at whatever it's looking at

functions.name: ai_automatic_migration_target
functions.description: enables or disables a squad as being an automatic migration target

functions.name: ai_follow_target_disable
functions.description: turns off following for an encounter

functions.name: ai_follow_target_players
functions.description: sets the follow target for an encounter to be the closest player

functions.name: ai_follow_target_unit
functions.description: sets the follow target for an encounter to be a specific unit

functions.name: ai_follow_target_ai
functions.description: sets the follow target for an encounter to be a group of AI (encounter, squad or platoon)

functions.name: ai_follow_distance
functions.description: sets the distance threshold which will cause squads to migrate when following someone

functions.name: ai_conversation
functions.description: tries to add an entry to the list of conversations waiting to play. returns FALSE if the required units could not be found to play the conversation, or if the player is too far away and the 'delay' flag is not set.

functions.name: ai_conversation_stop
functions.description: stops a conversation from playing or trying to play

functions.name: ai_conversation_advance
functions.description: tells a conversation that it may advance

functions.name: ai_conversation_line
functions.description: returns which line the conversation is currently playing, or 999 if the conversation is not currently playing

functions.name: ai_conversation_status
functions.description: returns the status of a conversation (0=none, 1=trying to begin, 2=waiting for guys to get in position, 3=playing, 4=waiting to advance, 5=could not begin, 6=finished successfully, 7=aborted midway

functions.name: ai_link_activation
functions.description: links the first encounter so that it will be made active whenever it detects that the second encounter is active

functions.name: ai_berserk
functions.description: forces a group of actors to start or stop berserking

functions.name: ai_set_team
functions.description: makes an encounter change to a new team

functions.name: ai_allow_charge
functions.description: either enables or disables charging behavior for a group of actors

functions.name: ai_allow_dormant
functions.description: either enables or disables automatic dormancy for a group of actors

functions.name: ai_allegiance_broken

functions.name: camera_control
functions.description: toggles script control of the camera.

functions.name: camera_set
functions.description: moves the camera to the specified camera point over the specified number of ticks.

functions.name: camera_set_relative
functions.description: moves the camera to the specified camera point over the specified number of ticks (position is relative to the specified object).

functions.name: camera_set_animation
functions.description: begins a prerecorded camera animation.

functions.name: camera_set_first_person
functions.description: makes the scripted camera follow a unit.

functions.name: camera_set_dead

functions.name: camera_time
functions.description: returns the number of ticks remaining in the current camera interpolation.

functions.description: saves the camera position and facing to camera_<map_name>.txt

functions.name: debug_camera_load_name
functions.description: loads the camera position and facing from <name>_<map_name>.txt

functions.name: debug_camera_load_simple_name
functions.description: loads the camera position and facing from camera_<name>.txt

functions.description: loads the camera position and facing from a passed in string

functions.name: game_speed

functions.name: game_time

functions.name: game_variant

functions.name: crash

functions.description: returns the current structure bsp index

functions.name: texture_cache_flush

functions.name: sound_cache_flush

functions.description: does a screen fade out to a particular color

functions.name: game_lost

functions.name: game_safe_to_save
functions.description: returns FALSE if it would be a bad idea to save the player's game right now

functions.name: game_all_quiet

functions.name: game_safe_to_speak
functions.description: returns FALSE if it would be a bad idea to save the player's game right now

functions.name: game_is_cooperative
functions.description: returns TRUE if the game is cooperative

functions.name: game_save
functions.description: checks to see if it is safe to save game, then saves (gives up after 8 seconds)

functions.name: game_save_cancel
functions.description: cancels any pending game_save, timeout or not

functions.name: game_save_no_timeout
functions.description: checks to see if it is safe to save game, then saves (this version never gives up)

functions.name: game_save_totally_unsafe

functions.name: game_saving
functions.description: checks to see if the game is trying to save the map.

functions.name: game_revert

functions.description: loads debug game state from core\<path> as soon as the map is initialized

functions.name: sv_map_reset
functions.description: <Server Only> Reset the current game

functions.name: sv_map_restart
functions.description: <Server Only> Restart the current game

functions.name: rcon
functions.description: Sends a command for server to execute at console. Use \" to send quotes.

functions.name: sv_rcon_password
functions.description:
Sets the server remote console password. If no password is given, displays the
 current password. Enter "" to disable rcon.

functions.name: sv_say
functions.description:
<Server Only> Usage: "sv_say <message>"
Send a message to users

functions.name: sv_players
functions.description: <Server Only> Print a list of players in the current game

functions.name: sv_kick
functions.description:
<Server Only> Usage: sv_kick <player # or name>
Kicks the specified player from the server

functions.name: sv_ban
functions.description:
<Server Only> Player is kicked and added to banned.txt.  Use sv_players to find the index.
Specify optional duration for timed ban.  Use 0 to follow sv_ban_penalty rules.

functions.name: sv_banlist
functions.description: Print a list of banned players

functions.name: sv_unban
functions.description:
<Server Only> Usage: sv_unban <index>
Removes player at index in the banlist.  Use sv_banlist to find the index

functions.name: sv_parameters_reload
functions.description:
<Server Only> Usage: sv_parameters_reload
Reloads the parameters.cfg file.

functions.name: sv_parameters_dump
functions.description: Dumps out the local parameter configuration to parameters.cfg file.

functions.name: sv_status
functions.description: Shows status of the server

functions.name: sv_name
functions.description: Sets the name of the server. If no name is given, displays the current name.

functions.name: sv_password
functions.description:
Sets the server password. If no password is given, displays the
current password.

functions.name: sv_log_note
functions.description: Leave a note in the server log

functions.name: sv_log_file
functions.description:
Sets the server log file name. If no name is given, displays the
current log file name.

functions.name: sv_log_enabled
functions.description:
Enables or disables server logging. If 0/1 is not given, displays the
current logging status.

functions.name: sv_log_rotation_threshold
functions.description:
Sets the log rotation threshold. When a log file's size (in kilobytes) exceeds
this number, it will be rotated. Set to 0 to disable log rotation.
If the threshold is not specified, displays the current threshold.

functions.name: sv_log_echo_chat
functions.description:
Enables or disbles chat echo to the console. Set the preference to 0
to disable chat echo, or 1 to enable chat echo.
If the preference is not specified, displays the current preference.

functions.name: track_remote_player_position_updates
functions.description: Sets the name of the remote player whose position update are to be tracked.

functions.name: remote_player_stats
functions.description: Displays the prediction stats of the specified remote player.

functions.name: sv_get_player_action_queue_length
functions.description: Displays the action queue length for the specified player.

functions.name: thread_sleep
functions.description: Sleeps the calling thread for the specified number of ms.

functions.name: sv_maplist
functions.description: Display a list of maps, matching an optional substring.

functions.name: sv_gamelist
functions.description: Display a list of game types, matching an optional substring.

functions.name: sv_friendly_fire
functions.description: Use to provide a global override for the gametype friendly fire setting.

functions.name: sv_timelimit
functions.description: Use to provide a global override for the gametype timelimit setting.

functions.name: sv_ban_penalty
functions.description: Specify up to 4 ban times for repeat ban/TK offenders.

functions.name: sv_tk_grace
functions.description: Specify the grace period for TK during which you don't get a TK point.

functions.name: sv_tk_cooldown
functions.description: Specify a TK point cooldown period, after which players lose a TK point.

functions.name: sv_banlist_file
functions.description: Sets and opens the file to be used for the player ban list.

functions.name: sv_maxplayers
functions.description: Sets the maximum number of players (between 1 and 16). If no value is given, displays the current value.

functions.name: sv_single_flag_force_reset
functions.description:
Force the flag to reset in single flag CTF games when the timer expires, even if held by a player.
If not specified, displays the current value.

functions.name: sv_motd
functions.description:
Sets the server message of the day file name. If no name is given, displays the
current motd file name. Set to "" to turn motd off.

functions.name: oid_watch
functions.description: Sets/displays translated object table watch parameters.

functions.name: oid_dump
functions.description: dumps the whole translated object table to network.log

functions.name: oid_status
functions.description: displays the status of the translated object table.
